title: Women seen without hijabs on Mahsa Amini's death anniversary in Iran
content: Women in Iran were observed without hijabs, and prisoners began a hunger strike to commemorate the second anniversary of Mahsa Amini's death. Amini died in custody for allegedly violating dress codes, leading to widespread protests against Iran’s government and its strict hijab laws.
summary: Women in Iran were observed without hijabs, and prisoners began a hunger strike to commemorate the second anniversary of Mahsa Amini's death. Amini died in custody for allegedly violating dress codes, leading to widespread protests against Iran’s government and its strict hijab laws.

title: Japan’s elderly population hits record high
content: Japan's elderly population has surged to a record high of 36.25 million, representing 29.3 percent of the total populace. This demographic trend is escalating medical and welfare expenses amid a declining labour force. In response, a record number of elderly individuals—9.14 million—were employed in 2023, constituting 13.5 per cent of the workforce.
summary: Japan's elderly population has surged to a record high of 36.25 million, representing 29.3 percent of the total populace. This demographic trend is escalating medical and welfare expenses amid a declining labour force. In response, a record number of elderly individuals—9.14 million—were employed in 2023, constituting 13.5 per cent of the workforce.

title: Trump assassination bid: Secret Service defends 'textbook' response
content: The Secret Service successfully prevented an assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump, with an agent quickly responding to a suspect brandishing a weapon near Mar-a-Lago. Acting Director Ronald Rowe Jr praised the agency’s protective measures but acknowledged the strain on agents after an earlier attempt on Trump in July, which led to public criticism and the resignation of former Director Kimberly Cheatle.
summary: The Secret Service successfully prevented an assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump, with an agent quickly responding to a suspect brandishing a weapon near Mar-a-Lago. Acting Director Ronald Rowe Jr praised the agency’s protective measures but acknowledged the strain on agents after an earlier attempt on Trump in July, which led to public criticism and the resignation of former Director Kimberly Cheatle.

title: Meta bans Russian news agencies over 'foreign interference activity'
content: Meta has banned Russian news agency RT, Rossiya Segodnya, and other state-controlled media networks for allegedly engaging in deceptive tactics to avoid detection. The ban will be enforced globally across Meta's platforms like Facebook and Instagram. This action follows US charges against RT employees accused of influencing the 2024 election through online content.
summary: Meta has banned Russian news agency RT, Rossiya Segodnya, and other state-controlled media networks for allegedly engaging in deceptive tactics to avoid detection. The ban will be enforced globally across Meta's platforms like Facebook and Instagram. This action follows US charges against RT employees accused of influencing the 2024 election through online content.

title: 'Our business is in a difficult period': Boeing considers layoffs amid workers' strike
content: In response to an ongoing factory workers' strike, Boeing has introduced several cost-saving measures. These include a hiring freeze, pausing pay increases for managers and executives, and halting non-essential travel. Temporary layoffs are also being considered as the strike poses significant risks to Boeing's financial recovery and plane delivery schedules.
summary: In response to an ongoing factory workers' strike, Boeing has introduced several cost-saving measures. These include a hiring freeze, pausing pay increases for managers and executives, and halting non-essential travel. Temporary layoffs are also being considered as the strike poses significant risks to Boeing's financial recovery and plane delivery schedules.

title: Historic rainfall triggers severe flooding in North Carolina
content: A powerful storm system brought historic rainfall to coastal North Carolina, causing severe flooding and significant disruptions. Carolina Beach declared a state of emergency after receiving 18 inches of rain in 12 hours. Emergency services conducted numerous rescues as homes and vehicles were submerged. The region remains under flood watch until Tuesday despite the storm weakening.
summary: A powerful storm system brought historic rainfall to coastal North Carolina, causing severe flooding and significant disruptions. Carolina Beach declared a state of emergency after receiving 18 inches of rain in 12 hours. Emergency services conducted numerous rescues as homes and vehicles were submerged. The region remains under flood watch until Tuesday despite the storm weakening.

title: Russians urged to have sex during work breaks to boost birth rate: Report
content: President Vladimir Putin has introduced a policy urging Russians to have sex during work breaks to combat the nation's declining birth rate. The initiative includes free fertility checks and financial incentives for new mothers. Stricter abortion access and increased divorce fees are also part of the strategy, aiming to reverse the projected population decline by 2050.
summary: President Vladimir Putin has introduced a policy urging Russians to have sex during work breaks to combat the nation's declining birth rate. The initiative includes free fertility checks and financial incentives for new mothers. Stricter abortion access and increased divorce fees are also part of the strategy, aiming to reverse the projected population decline by 2050.

title: Texas declares Venezuela-based gang a 'terrorist' group
content: Officials in Texas on Monday designated a Venezuelan gang called the Tren de Aragua as a "foreign terrorist group" and endorsed Donald Trump's claim that many migrants crossing into the United States were released from prisons in Latin America. Appearing at the same press conference as Banks, Governor Greg Abbott formally declared Tren de Aragua a "foreign terrorist organization."
summary: Officials in Texas on Monday designated a Venezuelan gang called the Tren de Aragua as a "foreign terrorist group" and endorsed Donald Trump's claim that many migrants crossing into the United States were released from prisons in Latin America. Appearing at the same press conference as Banks, Governor Greg Abbott formally declared Tren de Aragua a "foreign terrorist organization."

title: Trump blames Biden, Harris’ 'inflammatory language' for second assassination attempt
content: Donald Trump accused Joe Biden and Kamala Harris of inciting violence that resulted in a second assassination attempt on him. The suspect, Ryan Wesley Routh, was found armed at Trump's golf course in Florida but was later apprehended. Trump criticized the Democrats' inflammatory language and the media's biased coverage.
summary: Donald Trump accused Joe Biden and Kamala Harris of inciting violence that resulted in a second assassination attempt on him. The suspect, Ryan Wesley Routh, was found armed at Trump's golf course in Florida but was later apprehended. Trump criticized the Democrats' inflammatory language and the media's biased coverage.

title: Paraguay loves Mickey, its very own cartoon mouse. Disney doesn't
content: A third-generation family business in Paraguay called Mickey has successfully coexisted with Disney despite legal battles. Established in 1935, the company packages various goods and uses a mascot resembling Mickey Mouse. Although legally protected within Paraguay, the company hasn't ventured into international markets.
summary: A third-generation family business in Paraguay called Mickey has successfully coexisted with Disney despite legal battles. Established in 1935, the company packages various goods and uses a mascot resembling Mickey Mouse. Although legally protected within Paraguay, the company hasn't ventured into international markets.

title: 2 editors, reporter, driver in custody after trying to cross into India, says Bangladesh police
content: Three Bangladeshi journalists, including two editors, and a car driver were detained by police after locals apprehended them while allegedly trying to cross into India. The journalists were reportedly assaulted by residents before being handed over to the authorities. They are now in police custody and will be taken to Dhaka for legal procedures.
summary: Three Bangladeshi journalists, including two editors, and a car driver were detained by police after locals apprehended them while allegedly trying to cross into India. The journalists were reportedly assaulted by residents before being handed over to the authorities. They are now in police custody and will be taken to Dhaka for legal procedures.

title: Trump vs Kamala polls latest: Harris gains from post-debate bounce
content: ​According to NYT's polling average, Kamala Harris is leading Donald Trump by three percentage points nationwide. "The contest is even tighter in the critical battleground states, where no candidate leads by even a single percentage point in enough states to win the 270 electoral votes needed to win the presidency," the NYT report said.
summary: ​According to NYT's polling average, Kamala Harris is leading Donald Trump by three percentage points nationwide. "The contest is even tighter in the critical battleground states, where no candidate leads by even a single percentage point in enough states to win the 270 electoral votes needed to win the presidency," the NYT report said.

title: Donald Trump Jr dumps fiancee Kimberly Guilfoyle for Bettina Anderson?
content: Speculation arose about Donald Trump Jr's relationship with Kimberly Guilfoyle after he was seen with Bettina Anderson at the Honor Bar in August. Witnesses described them as relaxed and happy. Though they did not make out, they were seen kissing passionately. Despite this, Guilfoyle has stated that her relationship with Trump Jr is solid and she feels dedicated to him.
summary: Speculation arose about Donald Trump Jr's relationship with Kimberly Guilfoyle after he was seen with Bettina Anderson at the Honor Bar in August. Witnesses described them as relaxed and happy. Though they did not make out, they were seen kissing passionately. Despite this, Guilfoyle has stated that her relationship with Trump Jr is solid and she feels dedicated to him.

title: Bodycam video reveals this about 2nd assassination attempt on Donald Trump
content: Authorities released bodycam footage showing Ryan Wesley Routh's arrest after his attempt to kill Donald Trump in Florida was foiled. Routh hid for 12 hours with a loaded rifle before being apprehended. Trump blamed the Biden-Harris administration for rising violence, urging stricter border controls and deportations to address security concerns.
summary: Authorities released bodycam footage showing Ryan Wesley Routh's arrest after his attempt to kill Donald Trump in Florida was foiled. Routh hid for 12 hours with a loaded rifle before being apprehended. Trump blamed the Biden-Harris administration for rising violence, urging stricter border controls and deportations to address security concerns.

title: UK boosts vaccine stockpile amid concerns over new Mpox variant
content: The UK government has secured over 150,000 doses of Bavarian Nordic's mpox vaccine to tackle a new variant circulating in African countries. Distribution will prioritize high-risk groups like healthcare professionals and men who have sex with men. The WHO has approved the vaccine and started a global distribution initiative to support vulnerable populations.
summary: The UK government has secured over 150,000 doses of Bavarian Nordic's mpox vaccine to tackle a new variant circulating in African countries. Distribution will prioritize high-risk groups like healthcare professionals and men who have sex with men. The WHO has approved the vaccine and started a global distribution initiative to support vulnerable populations.

title: Did JD Vance admit he spread fake news about Haitian immigrants eating cats and dogs?
content: On a CNN interview, JD Vance was cornered about the veracity of the claims. "If I have to create stories so that the American media actually pays attention to the suffering of the American people, then that's what I'm going to do," JD Vance said. "Over the weekend, vice presidential candidate and sitting Ohio senator JD Vance admitted that he lied to incite violence against Haitian immigrants, including his own constituents. There are no words," Hillary Clinton wrote.
summary: On a CNN interview, JD Vance was cornered about the veracity of the claims. "If I have to create stories so that the American media actually pays attention to the suffering of the American people, then that's what I'm going to do," JD Vance said. "Over the weekend, vice presidential candidate and sitting Ohio senator JD Vance admitted that he lied to incite violence against Haitian immigrants, including his own constituents. There are no words," Hillary Clinton wrote.

title: More than 500 UK runners set unofficial record with giant T-rex charity run
content: Over 500 runners in inflatable T-rex costumes faced windy conditions during a charity fun run on Douglas Promenade. Organised by Expedition Limitless and supported by Manx Mencap, the event raised £12,000 and set an unofficial world record for the largest T-rex race. This adds to their total fundraising of over £120,000.
summary: Over 500 runners in inflatable T-rex costumes faced windy conditions during a charity fun run on Douglas Promenade. Organised by Expedition Limitless and supported by Manx Mencap, the event raised £12,000 and set an unofficial world record for the largest T-rex race. This adds to their total fundraising of over £120,000.

title: F**king demented: Trump's son slams Rachel Vindman for 'no ears were harmed' joke. She deletes it
content: ​ "No ears were harmed. Carry one with your Sunday afternoon," Vindman posted referring to the ear injury that Trump sustained when Thomas Matthew Crooks opened fire at him at a Pennsylvania rally in July. ​Donald Trump Jr called her 'f**king demented' for the statement. "Today she celebrated the assassination attempt of president Trump by a pro Ukraine mercenary," Donald Trump's aide Laura Loomer wrote on X.
summary: ​ "No ears were harmed. Carry one with your Sunday afternoon," Vindman posted referring to the ear injury that Trump sustained when Thomas Matthew Crooks opened fire at him at a Pennsylvania rally in July.  ​Donald Trump Jr called her 'f**king demented' for the statement. "Today she celebrated the assassination attempt of president Trump by a pro Ukraine mercenary," Donald Trump's aide Laura Loomer wrote on X.

title: Second assassination attempt on Trump triggers outrage, suspicion on all sides
content: US authorities prevented an assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump at a Florida resort. The suspect, Ryan Wesley Routh, was arrested after being spotted with a rifle. Trump confirmed his safety and thanked law enforcement. This incident raises concerns about security measures following two attempts in 60 days.
summary: US authorities prevented an assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump at a Florida resort. The suspect, Ryan Wesley Routh, was arrested after being spotted with a rifle. Trump confirmed his safety and thanked law enforcement. This incident raises concerns about security measures following two attempts in 60 days.

title: MAGA vs Dems: Firestorm erupts over political allegiance of Ryan Routh, suspect in Trump assassination bid
content: Following an alleged assassination attempt on Donald Trump by Ryan Routh, Republicans and Democrats disputed his political affiliation. Both parties referenced his voting record and donations to bolster their arguments. The event triggered social media confrontations, fund-raising campaigns, and controversy surrounding a tweet from Elon Musk.
summary: Following an alleged assassination attempt on Donald Trump by Ryan Routh, Republicans and Democrats disputed his political affiliation. Both parties referenced his voting record and donations to bolster their arguments. The event triggered social media confrontations, fund-raising campaigns, and controversy surrounding a tweet from Elon Musk.
